The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 22 December is 1,804,923 (3,206.6 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 17 December, there were 171,201 new confirmed cases (304.2 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 10 December, there were 104,079 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 64% (67,122 extra cases).
